ygData.subject: The war for Gaia

Subject: The war for Gaia
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

The three brothers were fighting. This was a seemingly unimportant 
planet, but it was their homeland, and they were its guardians. The 
invaders, however, were many. Even Older Brother's magic, even Middle 
Brother's leadership, even Younger Brother's brutality had not 
discouraged the enemy from renewing the assault.

Wendigo: That's it! They just keep coming! They entered the storage 
bay, and I'm going at them!

Before his two brothers could stop him, Wendigo was out in the 
storage bay and took out his tomahawks. He whirled them at the dozen 
or so Tripredacus that came at him. They all fell, some with heads 
rolling along, others with gashing wounds revealing their sparks.

Wendigo knelt. He had been hit by the return-fire, but he knew how to 
heal. He grasped a body and opened the spark chambers, then set his 
hungry teeth and ate the still pulsating spark. The power rejuvenated 
him and he was ready for more.

When he returned, Middle Brother looked thoughtfully outwards.

Wendigo: That was the last of these guys. They're not going back.

Croatan: Mmh? Oh yeah... good job, Younger Brother...

Wendigo looked around and wondered.

Wendigo: Where has Uktena gone?

Croatan: He went to take care of some intruders that got too close to 
the Spirit Lodge. He'll be back soon enough.

Uktena was hiding above the intruders. They hadn't noticed him, but 
they soon would. He closed his eyes and laid down his bow, then he 
joined hands.

The ground around the Tripredacus recon patrol started melting and 
liquifying. Soon, they were mired down in quicksands that hadn't been 
there before. The quicksand dried and were solid once more. Then, 
Uktena summoned the powers of the Spirit Lodge. A Lightning Ball 
appeared in the middle of the surprised invaders and made ash out of 
them before Uktena banished it with a thankful thought. He then 
returned to his brothers.

Uktena: I sent them to greet the Dark Lands. Anymore of them?

Wendigo: I don't know... Croatan's been in the command center for a 
few cycles now...

Croatan's voice came to them at that moment.

Croatan: They're trying to take our shuttle! Get them, I'll meet you 
there!

When Older and Younger Brothers arrived in the shuttle, all was 
silent and calm. They were waiting for an ambush, when suddenly, the 
engines thrummed to life and all doors closed up. They had been 
locked in!

Wendigo: Dammit! It's a trap!

Uktena was petrified as he looked through the porthole. Wendigo, 
puzzled, came up to him, and froze too.

Croatan was outside. Alone.

He was going to sacrifice himself.

Uktena: Middle Brother... Why?

Croatan: I am sorry brothers... We cannot win this fight. I must do 
this myself. You have wisdom, Uktena, and you, Wendigo, you have the 
strength of thousands. You must live, both of you. You can reclaim 
our planet after the threat is gone.

Wendigo: (His voice no more than a cold whisper) Croatan... Do not be 
so stupid... You can't take them all out. You need us!

Croatan was sad now. He barely could look at his brothers face to 
face.

Croatan: I... I can't let you two die... Farewell!

The shuttle roared to life as Croatan left the launching bay. Soon, 
both of the remaining brothers looked at the planet from screens.

All seemed calm for a moment, then all Hell was set loose. It started 
at the spirit lodge. Thunderbird Himself led the charge and wiped 
many of the invaders off the planet's face. Then, after he was pinned 
down, everything exploded.

Everything.

Nothing and no one was left on the planet's surface.

Uktena was unsuccessfully holding tears back, and Wendigo was gap-
mouthed, unable to realize fully what had just happened.

This was the sacrifice of Middle Brother.
